channel.title: The Speed

item.title: The Speed
item.dc:creator: @Jump_On_Java Jump On Java
item.description:
@Jump_On_Java wrote:

Hi, I’m Trying To Change The Speed Of My Hand, Because At The Moment It Hits Like 10, 1’s Within 2 Seconds. I’m Using TestScape. This Is How I Do It But It Doesn’t Seem To Work -

I Open Up Client.Java And I Search For -

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) //Whip

Then I Can See -

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) //Whip { PkingDelay = 16; wepdelay = 16; }

Above That I Added This -

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (-1)) // Fist { PkingDelay = 16; wepdelay = 16; setAnimation(1658); resetanim = 14; }

[b]And I Saved, Compiled And Ran But It Didn’t Work It Still Hits Like 10 1’s Within 2 Seconds.

Can Anyone Help ?[/b]

Read full topic
